title: Biz member reviews and updates booking status Snapshot

view.title: Biz member reviews and updates booking status
view.subtitle: Bookings reviewed and one booking progressed.

blocks.title: Member Review Bookings completed
blocks.message: Bookings reviewed and one booking progressed.

resultPayload.note: Bookings reviewed and one booking progressed.

data.instruction: Upload snapshots for critical steps and submit final markdown report summarizing pass/fail and discovered gaps.
data.expectedResult: Run has persisted report + snapshots in project directory and indexed metadata in DB.

data.instruction: As biz member, list bookings and progress one booking through operational status updates.
data.expectedResult: Authorized role can update status while preserving auditability and lifecycle consistency.

data.instruction: Query and compare availability + bookings timeline for the entities involved in this scenario.
data.expectedResult: Calendar state reflects booked slots, blocks, and any conflict outcomes from previous steps.

data.instruction: Using credentials from another context, attempt to read or mutate booking/order resources for this biz.
data.expectedResult: Request is rejected with forbidden/unauthorized error and no data leakage.
